content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with a fuel inventory containing 18 coal.

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with a fuel inventory containing 6 coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has available space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The first furnace is currently full (18/50 items), and the second furnace has limited capacity (6/50 items). 

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure there are enough items in the furnace to extract. Both furnaces reported "no ingredients to smelt" and failed to extract when empty.

### Errors when attempting to insert more items than available
- When inserting items, ensure that the number of items being inserted does not exceed the available items in your inventory. 

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have sufficient raw materials in your inventory to craft the desired items.
